title: 20 - The Bible Told Me So
description:
In this episode we uncover yet another, heartfelt email. "What authority does the Bible have over your (Mike Erre) life?" and "I don't hear you use the word inerrant (infallible), why is that?" are two great questions we wanted answer.  Listen, and find out the reason why I avoid the phrase biblical inerrancy. We've been raised on the phrase "The Bible Told Me So."  The question is for us though, how did it tell us so.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
